name: Git "Gat" Gud
description:
You are a mountaineer cat, going through a snowy mountain, who has lost it's partners. Search and find your kitty friends in this freezy place where every run will be different, and be careful it's very cold here and the time is running out!
Gotta find'em all to Git "Gat" Gud!

CONTROLS 

Mouse ->Menu navigation 

Arrow keys [W,A,S,D] -> Cat movement

Game made for the Global Game Jam Online 2021 by the team Osos Polares

Global Game Jam 2021 - Git "Gat" Gud
